i18n.description: If translations will be provided via files, e.g. in admin/i18n/de/translations.json or provide the path to the i18n folder if it's custom or provide the translations inside this attribute as an object

step.description: Step size for increase and decrease buttons

variant.description: If button is outlined, contained or text

trim.description: If text must be trimmed or not (default = true)

readOnly.description: Shows text as read only field

minRows.description: default is 1. Set this attribute to `2` or more if you want to have a textarea with more than one row

maxRows.description: max rows of textarea. Used only if `minRows` > 1

name.description: Component name that will be provided via props, like ComponentInstancesEditor

certificatesProps.description: Universal type that manages `certPublic`, `certPrivate`, `certChained` and `leCollection` attributes

encrypted.description: Is value encrypted or not (of course only for texts)

repeat.description: Password must be compared with password

visible.description: True if allow to view the password by toggling the view button

instance.description: Check if the instance is alive. If not defined, it will be used current instance. You can use `${data.number}` pattern in the text.

textAlive.description: Default text is `Instance %s is alive`, where `%s` will be replaced by `ADAPTER.0`

textNotAlive.description: Default text is `Instance %s is not alive`, where `%s` will be replaced by `ADAPTER.0`

complex.description: Show CRON with "minutes", "seconds" and so on

jsonData.description: Data to be sent as parsable string, can contain special placeholder. E. g. '{"subject1": "${data.subject}", "options1": {"host": "${data.host}"}}'

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

useNative.description: if adapter returns result with `native` attribute it will be used for configuration. If `saveConfig` is true, the user will be requested to save the configuration

showProcess.description: Show spinner while request is in progress

openUrl.description: if true - open URL in new tab, if response contains attribute openUrl, like {"openUrl": "http://1.2.3.4:80/aaa", "window": "_blank", "saveConfig": true}. If saveConfig is true, the user will be requested to save the configuration.

doNotSaveProp.description: Do not save this attribute as used only for internal calculations

iconPositionProp.description: Only for panels that has `icon` attribute.

allowAddByFilterProp.description: If add allowed even if filter is set

alsoDependsOnSendProp.description: Depends on other attributes and will be re-calculated when other attributes changed

items.description: Consists of objects representing e.g. a single tab

system.description: Allow the usage of the system language from system.config as default

jsonData.description: Data to be sent as parsable string, can contain special placeholder. E. g. '{"subject1": "${data.subject}", "options1": {"host": "${data.host}"}}'

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

freeSolo.description: Set freeSolo to true so the textbox can contain any arbitrary value.

jsonData.description: Data to be sent as parsable string, can contain special placeholder. E. g. '{"subject1": "${data.subject}", "options1": {"host": "${data.host}"}}'

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

jsonData.description: Data to be sent as parsable string, can contain special placeholder. E. g. '{"subject1": "${data.subject}", "options1": {"host": "${data.host}"}}'

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

crop.description: If true, allow user to crop the image (only for non svg)

square.description: Width must be equal to height or crop must allow only square as shape

crop.description: If true, allow user to crop the image (only for non svg)

square.description: Width must be equal to height or crop must allow only square as shape

freeSolo.description: Set freeSolo to true so the textbox can contain any arbitrary value.

options.description: Options which can be completed. ["value1", "value2", ...] or [{"value": "value", "label": "Value1"}, "value2", ...]

hidden.description: JS function that could use `native.attribute` for calculation

noDelete.description: If delete or add disabled, If noDelete is false, add, delete and move up/down should work

uniqueColumns.description: Specify the 'attr' name of columns which need to be unique

export.description: If export button should be shown. Export as csv file.

import.description: if import button should be shown. Import from csv file.

clone.description: If clone button should be shown. If true, the clone button will be shown. If attribute name, this name will be unique.

system.description: Allow the usage of the system language from system.config as default

jsonData.description: Data to be sent as parsable string, can contain special placeholder. E. g. '{"subject1": "${data.subject}", "options1": {"host": "${data.host}"}}'

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

freeSolo.description: Set freeSolo to true so the textbox can contain any arbitrary value.

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

crop.description: If true, allow user to crop the image (only for non svg)

square.description: Width must be equal to height or crop must allow only square as shape

crop.description: If true, allow user to crop the image (only for non svg)

square.description: Width must be equal to height or crop must allow only square as shape

jsonData.description: Data to be sent as parsable string, can contain special placeholder. E. g. '{"subject1": "${data.subject}", "options1": {"host": "${data.host}"}}'

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

openUrl.description: if true - open URL in new tab, if response contains attribute openUrl, like {"openUrl": "http://1.2.3.4:80/aaa", "window": "_blank", "saveConfig": true}. If saveConfig is true, the user will be requested to save the configuration.

useNative.description: if adapter returns result with `native` attribute it will be used for configuration. If `saveConfig` is true, the user will be requested to save the configuration

showProcess.description: Show spinner while request is in progress

step.description: Step size for increase and decrease buttons

freeSolo.description: Set freeSolo to true so the textbox can contain any arbitrary value.

options.description: Options which can be completed. ["value1", "value2", ...] or [{"value": "value", "label": "Value1"}, "value2", ...]

complex.description: Show CRON with "minutes", "seconds" and so on

trim.description: If text must be trimmed or not (default = true)

minRows.description: default is 1. Set this attribute to `2` or more if you want to have a textarea with more than one row

maxRows.description: max rows of textarea. Used only if `minRows` > 1

readOnly.description: Shows text as read only field

hidden.description: JS function that could use `native.attribute` for calculation

pattern.description: Read-only field with pattern like 'https://${data.ip}:${data.port}' (will not be saved in config)

okText.description: Alert that will be shown by pressing the button

adapter.description: Name of the adapter. With special name _dataSources you can get all adapters with flag common.getHistory

all.description: Add to the options ALL option with value *

delimiter.description: Delimiter for options. If no delimiter, the setting will be stored as array

types.description: Array of possible types: ['channel', 'device', ...] (has only state by default)

uuid.description: If UUID must be checked too

sm.description: Width in 1/12 of screen on small screen

md.description: width in 1/12 of screen on middle screens

lg.description: width in 1/12 of screen on large screens

xs.description: width in 1/12 of screen on very small screens

newLine.description: Should be shown from new line

hidden.description: JS function that could use 'native.attribute' for calculation

hideOnlyControl.description: If hidden the place will be shown, but no control

disabled.description: JS function that could use 'native.attribute' for calculation

style.description: css style in react notation: 'radiusBorder' and not 'radius-border'

validator.description: JS function: true no error, false - error

validatorNoSaveOnError.description: True if save must be disabled by errors

validatorErrorText.description: Text to show if validator fails

showSecondAddAt.description: Number of lines from which the second add button at the bottom of the table will be shown. Default 5

showFirstAddOnTop.description: Show first plus button on top of the first column and not on the left.

ignoreOwnChanges.description: Do not trigger onChange event if changed value of this attribute

defaultFunc.description: JS function to calculate default value

noTranslation.description: Do not translate selects or other options (not for help, label or placeholder)

condition.description: JS function: true show confirm dialog

alsoDependsOn.description: Trigger confirm dialog if one of the components changed.

noMultiEdit.description: (only custom) if this flag set to true, this field will not be shown if user selected more than one object for edit

maxLength.description: max length of text in field

pattern.description: Read-only field with pattern like 'https://${data.ip}:${data.port}' (will not be saved in config)

okText.description: Alert that will be shown by pressing the button

adapter.description: Name of the adapter. With special name _dataSources you can get all adapters with flag common.getHistory

all.description: Add to the options ALL option with value *

delimiter.description: Delimiter for options. If no delimiter, the setting will be stored as array

types.description: Array of possible types: ['channel', 'device', ...] (has only state by default)

uuid.description: If UUID must be checked too

xs.description: width in 1/12 of screen on very small screens

ignoreOwnChanges.description: Do not trigger onChange event if changed value of this attribute

defaultFunc.description: JS function to calculate default value

noTranslation.description: Do not translate selects or other options (not for help, label or placeholder)

condition.description: JS function: true show confirm dialog

alsoDependsOn.description: Trigger confirm dialog if on of the components changed.

noMultiEdit.description: (only custom) if this flag set to true, this field will not be shown if user selected more than one object for edit
